name: 10.2 "Get Your Kicks on Route 666" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was on vacation in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	He sent everyone a postcard that said, "I'm having a great time on vacation. I miss everyone but I miss you most of all. Love, Woody".Everyone, that is, except Cliff. His postcard said, "I'm having a great time on vacation. Love, Woody."

questions.text: From whom did Frasier learn about the "the inner hairy man"?
questions.explanation:
Sally Jesse Raphael.

	Frasier wanted to get in touch with this part of himself. Lilith said in his case it was "the receding hairy man".

questions.text: What did Frasier call the trip he was going on?
questions.explanation:
Primal Journey.

	He said he was going to just get in his car and go. Then he asked Sam to go because driving at night alone scared him.

questions.text: Who all went with Frasier on his trip?
questions.explanation:
Sam, Cliff, and Norm.

	Frasier only wanted Sam to go.  However, Cliff invited himself and Norm along. When Frasier said his car wasn't very big, Cliff said they could use his car.

questions.text: Who filled in for Sam at Cheers?
questions.explanation:
Carla's nephew, Frankie.

	Frankie was played by Anthony Addabbo. Both Lilith and Rebecca had the hots for him.

questions.text: What do all the ladies at the bar "accidentally drop"?
questions.explanation:
Purses.

	They all want to see Frankie bend over. Lilith had mentioned he had a magnificent butt and the others agreed.

questions.text: When was the last time Cliff said he cried?
questions.explanation:
Junior Prom.

	He said a pin stuck him in the chest and he got staph infection. Frasier said the last time he cried was the morning of their trip. He cried because a  picture Frederick drew was so beautiful. Cliff replied, "Good luck finding that hairy man."

questions.text: When was the last time Norm cried?
questions.correct: When they found out Vera wasn't pregnant
options: When Vera's mother came to visit
questions.explanation:
When they found out Vera wasn't pregnant.

	He said she was lying and didn't tell him until after the wedding.  Norm was always implying he didn't want to be married to Vera, or anyone for that matter. He just wanted to sit on a bar stool and drink beer without having to worry about anyone else but himself.

questions.text: When Sam tried to hot-wire the car and was electrocuted, who did he think Cliff was?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Sam broke the key off in the ignition. Frasier was going to call for help, but Sam insisted on hot-wiring the car.

Norm.

	At first, the others were upset with him for spending the night there and not telling him. Then he asked if they wanted to run the breakfast buffet. Frasier answered, "Well, naturally the buffet."
